synopsis:
Hachiouji-P's 2nd published VOCALOID work. The song about a manipulative girl who plays with men's hearts. According to the author, his intention was to publish it for Valentine's Day.
This song is featured in Hachiouji-P's albums Distorted Princess, ×××× the ripper (8#Prince Raver Remix) and electric love. It can also be found in the compilation albums DJ Lily Presents SUPER VOCALOID, Hatsune Miku Vision, VOCA NICO☆PARTY, -Project DIVA- f Complete Collection, and Hatsune Miku "Magical Mirai 2014" Official Album.
(Source: Vocaloid Wiki)
